mapper.select: SELECT IDX, TITLE, HIT_CNT, REGIST_DATE FROM INQUIRY ORDER BY IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY ( IDX, TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, REGIST_DATE, INQUIRY_STATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_INQUIRY_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, 0, N, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRY SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
